mapper.select: select pre_fix ,date_type from sys_auto_no where pre_fix = #{PRE_FIX}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_auto_no_dtl (pre_fix, reg_date, last_number) values (#{PRE_FIX}, #{REG_DATE}, (SELECT LPAD((COALESCE(MAX(last_number)::int, 0) + 1)::text, 4, '0') FROM sys_auto_no_dtl WHERE pre_fix = #{PRE_FIX} AND reg_date = #{REG_DATE}))
